name: Robert BARNHART, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Barnhart v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation Parole

parties: Robert BARNHART, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of March, 2003, the above captioned appeal is quashed as untimely. Rule 903(a), Pa.R.A.P.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
821 A.2d 1202
Robert BARNHART, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee.
No. 9 MAP 2003.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 24, 2003.
Reargument Denied May 21, 2003.
